creditline: Anonymous gift in memory of John L. and Ruth M. McKelvey
description: Bowl depicting "children at play" motif; white ground with blue monochrome detailing; interior is white/grey; clothed children play instruments and carry a umbrella on one side and partially nude children play around a table on the other; scenes are separated by zig-zag fences; round, dark wood stand
title: Bowl depicting the "children at play" motif
